name: Endless Tower Platformer
description: Before I start, I wanna say that this is not at all the final game. I've been wanting to make one of those endless platformers where you jump up a tower for a while now, and I've started putting that into action. Controls are either A and D or arrow keys and space to jump. I'm also working on getting it to building to WebGL, but in the meantime it'll have to wait. If you have any feedback, then please comment with it down in the comments. I have uploaded all of the builds that I have made so far (I recommend going for the latest one but you can decide) and I will be making a devlog for each of the builds. With that said, enjoy!
